intro_panels.title: The Descent
intro_panels.script: The mobs took the manor. The peasantry took the lands. All that remains is a name and a hunger for what was lost. They say the Soul Coin can buy anything—even a wish. I found the cave. The stories weren't just myths; they were a map.

intro_panels.title: The City of Shadows
intro_panels.script: The air grew cold, smelling of ancient dust and damp stone. Then, the ceiling opened up to a nightmare of architecture—a city built for the dead, hidden beneath the world. If the city is real, then the coins must be too.

intro_panels.title: The First Toll
intro_panels.script: The first chest was easy. The first skeleton was easier. But as the first Soul Coin hit my palm, I felt its weight—heavy and cold. The merchants here are shadows, whispering of a 'Soul Broker' with his own dark agenda. I don't care about his plans. I only care about the price of my throne.

ending_panels.title: The Broker's Fall
ending_panels.script: The Broker lies broken. His wings, once vast and terrifying, are now just tattered shadows on the floor. I have done what no other could. The hoard is mine.

ending_panels.title: The Gilded Fever
ending_panels.script: Gold. Not just gold—souls. Every coin is a life, a dream, a debt. And I want them all. I will buy back my name. I will buy back the world.

ending_panels.title: The New Debt
ending_panels.script: The weight of the coins is different now. They don't just sit in my hands; they belong to me. And as the fire burns in my blood, I realize... the Broker didn't just die. He found a successor.

true_ending.title: The Dual Sovereignty
true_ending.script: The Broker's game is over. His throne was too small for what we have become. Together, we sit upon a mountain of souls, the new masters of the dark. We no longer need the armor of our past lives; our power is our protection. The underground is our kingdom, and the world above is just another debt waiting to be collected.
